title: World Series: Kyle Schwarber Did What the Cubs Couldnâ€™t
description: A dynasty-to-be ended up with only one championship, but Schwarber, an affable slugger known for (very) long home runs, is back in the Fall Classic with Philadelphia.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:credit: Bill Streicher/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Kyle Schwarber has been on a team that qualified for the postseason in seven of his eight seasons. This is his second World Series.
